content: Love it!
Great üëç
These games have been my all time favorite. I used to play them as a kid, and I was overjoyed when I found out they developed them into mobile games.

I love these games and only have the first 2 installments on my DS and can't play them anymore which always made me sad. And then the idea that one day in the distant future my DS's and cartridges will break and I won't be able to aquire new ones... Yes I'm dramatic. But now you can understand my joy at suddenly learning that they're being released as apps!! The games have transfered for well into app form and everything is just as addictive and satisfying as I remember. I'm beyond thrilled
As Excellent as it was on the DS, the second installment of Professor Layton is filled with even more difficult puzzles and a satisfying and rewarding story.

THANK YOU for this amazing game. Professor Layton games have soo much charm and are so enthralling. This loving remaster is just perfect. Pleaae continue making these premium, feature length experiences for the Layton series, they're a real treat!
Get game played entirety of it
I love Prof. Layton, one of my all time favourite game series' with ridiculous hijinks, challenging riddles and delightful characters, whats not to love

Just like the DS version! I own both curious village and diabolical box on DS, but I was having issues with my DS dying constantly (it's like, 10 years old and I played it a lot) and it's great to have these games coming to mobile! But I do have to wonder, are they going to do Unwound Future? If so, I'm super excited!
I love the professor layton series i played all of them its a great series i hope they release more in the future
Touching story with whimsical characters accompanied by beautiful art.

Professor Layton was one of my favorite series growing up and I was thrilled to see they've got the first two installments available on the play store. It's a cute little story, wonderful art, and the puzzles are all fun and challenging. I hope they release more in the future.
Playing through this game hit me hard with the nostalgia from playing on the DS I loved every moment and didn't encounter a single issue!

Easy to understand gameplay. Lots of puzzles. Great mystery. The Professor Layton games are some of my absolute favorite games. Totally worth the money! I can't wait for rest of the series to be put on mobile.
What about the third and fourth one. Can't remember the names but there were 4 ds professor layton games and I want the other 2 Unwound future and the one that's supposed to be a pre-qual
What the hay is up with the voice acting? It sounds like Brits trying to do an American accent. Why fix something that isn't broken? I love this game, but come on...

A great game with a lot of fun puzzles and collectibles. I really enjoyed the whole tea set aspect it was cute. It has a great plot with tons of mysteries, and the ending is definitely a twist. It was worth the $10.
Great version. With nice uncompressed cutscenes (finally). But I wish we could switch between US and UK versions. Lukes VA is just way better in that one.
an amazing puzzle game with great art and an incredible story

As a big fan of the series, these mobile ports are a dream come true. The single downside of this version is that the DS game came with a print out of the ticket that really helped with a puzzle, everything else here is perfect and I loved revisiting this series.
Great port
Amazing as usual. Please keep making these!!!
Absolutely fabulous. I'm hoping that you will continue making the series avaliable on mobile because I can't wait for the next one! I'll definetly be buying the entire series!
A fantastic retelling of the classic DS game.
once again, the riddles and puzzles are great and storyline is fun
I love this series and hope that they continue to port them to this platform.
super fun

This game is just as amazing as the ds version. However, there is one big problem; you can't beat it. The last puzzle of the game the phone is unequipped for. I know what I have to do, but it can't be done with a phone. I'm sad that the developers did not take this one thing into account when making this great game app... EDIT: nevermind. They changed the last puzzle up on everybody. It is beatable, so don't give up!
Amazing !
awesome!
I hope the rest of the series can get this spectacular treatment. I played them all as a kid and it's great to see them polished like this!

Superbly done port! Great graphics, fun almost frenchy soundtrack, charming characters, a wonderful whimsical storyline and of course, pleasantly perplexing puzzles, all wrapped up into one affordable package for on the go? It'd be... *ahem* puzzling if you decided NOT to pick this up? ;) In all seriousness, whether you're a veteran Layton fan or have never played a game in the franchise before, you'll be satisfied with this game. Dive right in: you won't be disappointed ;)
I've been waiting so long for this. I really hope every Layton game gets the same treatment. Such a blast to play in HD. Give yourself a favor and play this and the first one, Curious Village.
